${currentUser.role===role?'text-white':'text-gray-300'}`,children:role.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+role.slice(1)})]},role);})})]})]})]});};export default BeautifulDarkLanding;

sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Car, Users, FileText, BarChart3, Search, Plus, Settings, LogOut, Eye, Shield, TrendingUp, DollarSign, Clock, Zap, ChevronRight, Activity, CheckCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const BeautifulDarkLanding = ({ currentUser: initialUser, onLogout }) => { const [currentUser, setCurrentUser] = useState(initialUser || { name: 'Chris Murphy', email: 'chris@rpexotics.com', role: 'admin', avatar: null }); const [currentTime, setCurrentTime] = useState(new Date()); useEffect(() => { const timer = setInterval(() => setCurrentTime(new Date()), 1000); return () => clearInterval(timer); }, []); const permissions = { admin: { canCreateDeals: true, canViewDeals: true, canEditDeals: true, canSearchDealers: true, canManageDealers: true, canAccessBackOffice: true, canViewReports: true, canViewFinancials: true, canManageUsers: true }, sales: { canCreateDeals: true, canViewDeals: true, canEditDeals: true, canSearchDealers: true, canManageDealers: true, canAccessBackOffice: false, canViewReports: true, canViewFinancials: false, canManageUsers: false }, finance: { canCreateDeals: false, canViewDeals: true, canEditDeals: true, canSearchDealers: true, canManageDealers: false, canAccessBackOffice: true, canViewReports: true, canViewFinancials: true, canManageUsers: false }, viewer: { canCreateDeals: false, canViewDeals: true, canEditDeals: false, canSearchDealers: true, canManageDealers: false, canAccessBackOffice: false, canViewReports: true, canViewFinancials: false, canManageUsers: false } }; const userPermissions = permissions[currentUser.role]; const getRoleIcon = (role) => { switch(role) { case 'admin': return Shield; case 'sales': return Car; case 'finance': return DollarSign; case 'viewer': return Eye; default: return Shield; } }; const getRoleGradient = (role) => { switch(role) { case 'admin': return 'from-blue-500 to-cyan-500'; case 'sales': return 'from-green-500 to-emerald-500'; case 'finance': return 'from-purple-500 to-pink-500'; case 'viewer': return 'from-orange-500 to-amber-500'; default: return 'from-gray-500 to-gray-600'; } }; const quickStats = [ { label: 'Active Deals', value: '15', change: '+3', icon: Car, gradient: 'from-blue-500 to-cyan-500', show: userPermissions.canViewDeals }, { label: 'Dealer Network', value: '73', change: '+5', icon: Users, gradient: 'from-green-500 to-emerald-500', show: userPermissions.canSearchDealers }, { label: 'Monthly Revenue', value: userPermissions.canViewFinancials ? '$2.1M' : 'Restricted', change: userPermissions.canViewFinancials ? '+12%' : null, icon: DollarSign, gradient: 'from-purple-500 to-pink-500', show: true }, { label: 'Pending Tasks', value: '6', change: '-2', icon: Clock, gradient: 'from-orange-500 to-amber-500', show: userPermissions.canAccessBackOffice } ].filter(stat => stat.show); const primaryActions = [ { title: 'New Deal Entry', description: 'Create a new vehicle deal with intelligent dealer matching and comprehensive financial tracking', icon: Plus, gradient: 'from-blue-600 via-blue-700 to-cyan-600', route: '/deals/new', show: userPermissions.canCreateDeals, feature: 'Smart VIN decoding • Dealer autocomplete • Financial calculators' }, { title: 'Dealer Search & Management', description: 'Advanced dealer lookup with relationship tracking, performance metrics, and contact management', icon: Search, gradient: 'from-green-600 via-green-700 to-emerald-600', route: '/dealers', show: userPermissions.canSearchDealers, feature: 'Real-time search • Deal history • Performance analytics' } ]; const secondaryActions = [ { title: 'Back Office Operations', subtitle: 'Documentation & Compliance', description: 'Title management, registration tracking, and compliance workflows', icon: FileText, gradient: 'from-purple-600 to-pink-600', show: userPermissions.canAccessBackOffice, tasks: 6 }, { title: 'Analytics & Reports', subtitle: 'Business Intelligence', description: 'Comprehensive reporting, performance metrics, and insights', icon: BarChart3, gradient: 'from-orange-600 to-amber-600', show: userPermissions.canViewReports, tasks: null }, { title: 'User Management', subtitle: 'System Administration', description: 'Manage user accounts, roles, and system permissions', icon: Users, gradient: 'from-indigo-600 to-purple-600', show: userPermissions.canManageUsers, tasks: null }, { title: 'System Monitoring', subtitle: 'Performance & Health', description: 'Monitor system performance, uptime, and database health', icon: Activity, gradient: 'from-teal-600 to-cyan-600', show: true, tasks: null } ]; const recentActivities = [ { id: 1, type: 'deal', title: '2020 McLaren 720S Deal Created', subtitle: 'Stock #RP2025001 • $220,000 • Ian Hutchinson', time: '2 hours ago', icon: Car, color: 'blue' }, { id: 2, type: 'document', title: 'Title Documentation Received', subtitle: '2019 Ferrari F8 Tributo • Stock #RP2025003', time: '4 hours ago', icon: FileText, color: 'green' }, { id: 3, type: 'dealer', title: 'New Dealer Contact Added', subtitle: 'Midwest Auto Group • Kansas City, MO', time: '1 day ago', icon: Users, color: 'purple' }, { id: 4, type: 'finance', title: 'Monthly P&L Report Generated', subtitle: '$2.1M revenue • 15% margin improvement', time: '2 days ago', icon: TrendingUp, color: 'orange' } ]; const RoleIcon = getRoleIcon(currentUser.role); const roleGradient = getRoleGradient(currentUser.role); return (
{/* Animated Background Elements */}
{/* Header */}
{ e.target.style.display = 'none'; e.target.nextSibling.style.display = 'block'; }} />

RP Exotics

Professional Vehicle Management

{/* User Profile */}

{currentUser.name}

{currentUser.role.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + currentUser.role.slice(1)}

{currentTime.toLocaleDateString()}

{currentTime.toLocaleTimeString()}

{userPermissions.canManageUsers && ( )}
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome back, {currentUser.name.split(' ')[0]}

{currentUser.role === 'admin' && 'You have complete administrative control over the RP Exotics management system with full access to all modules, financial data, and user management capabilities.'} {currentUser.role === 'sales' && 'Access your deal management tools and dealer network. Focus on what you do best - creating deals and building relationships.'} {currentUser.role === 'finance' && 'Monitor financial performance with comprehensive access to pricing data, margins, and back office operations.'} {currentUser.role === 'viewer' && 'Stay informed with read-only access to reports, analytics, and system information.'}

All Systems Operational
{/* Quick Stats */}
{quickStats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.change && ( {stat.change} )}

{stat.value}

{stat.label}

))}
{/* Primary Actions */}
{primaryActions.filter(action => action.show).map((action, index) => (

{action.title}

{action.description}

{action.feature}
))}
{/* Secondary Actions Grid */}
{secondaryActions.filter(action => action.show).map((action, index) => (
{action.tasks && ( {action.tasks} pending )}

{action.title}

{action.subtitle}

{action.description}

))}
{/* Dashboard Grid */}
{/* Deal Tracking Box - Sales Focus */} {userPermissions.canViewDeals && (

Deal Tracker {currentUser.role === 'admin' ? 'All Deals' : 'My Deals'}

{/* Deal 1 - Active */}
2020 McLaren 720S Active
Stock #RP2025001
Ian Hutchinson • {userPermissions.canViewFinancials ? ( $220,000 ) : ( Price Restricted )}
Created 2h ago
{/* Progress Bar */}
Progress:
Purchased
Vehicle Acquired Title Pending
{/* Deal 2 - Pending */}
2019 Ferrari F8 Tributo Pending
Stock #RP2025002
Midwest Auto Group • {userPermissions.canViewFinancials ? ( $285,000 ) : ( Price Restricted )}
Created 1d ago
{/* Progress Bar */}
Progress:
Title Review
Inspection Complete Title Processing
{/* Deal 3 - Ready to List */}
2021 Lamborghini Huracán Ready
Stock #RP2025003
Premium Auto Sales • {userPermissions.canViewFinancials ? ( $195,000 ) : ( Price Restricted )}
Created 3d ago
{/* Progress Bar */}
Progress:
Ready to List
Title Received Photos Complete
{/* Deal 4 - Sold */}
2022 Porsche 911 GT3 Sold
Stock #RP2025004
Elite Motors • {userPermissions.canViewFinancials ? ( $185,000 → $205,000 ) : ( Price Restricted )}
Sold 1w ago
{/* Progress Bar */}
Progress:
Complete
Delivered Payment Received
{userPermissions.canViewFinancials && ( +$20k profit )}
{/* Summary Row */}

4

Active Deals

1

Ready to List

2

In Progress

{userPermissions.canViewFinancials ? '$890K' : '***'}

Total Volume

)} {/* Recent Activity - Smaller if deals showing */} {!userPermissions.canViewDeals ? (

Recent Activity

{recentActivities.map((activity) => (

{activity.title}

{activity.subtitle}

{activity.time}
))}
) : (

Recent Activity

{recentActivities.slice(0, 3).map((activity) => (

{activity.title}

{activity.time}

))}
)} {/* System Health & Quick Actions */}
{/* System Health */}

System Health

Database
98%
API Response
142ms
Uptime
99.9%
{/* Quick Stats Summary */}

Today's Summary

New Deals 3
Dealer Contacts 12
Documents Processed 8
System Logins 24
{/* Role Demo Switcher */}

Demo: Switch User Roles

{Object.keys(permissions).map((role) => { const RoleIcon = getRoleIcon(role); const gradient = getRoleGradient(role); const names = { admin: 'Chris Murphy', sales: 'Parker Gelber', finance: 'Lynn', viewer: 'Mike Peterson' }; return ( ); })}
); }; export default BeautifulDarkLanding;
